app.content.professionalDeveloperIntro: Professional developer with 20+ years of experience building software.
app.content.professionalProgrammerExperi: As a professional programmer, I exclusively develop for you and your business needs. I have worked in several countries which include the UK, Ireland, Germany, Spain and South America. I have worked on more than 70 projects. The companies I have worked for include many industries such as education, sports, fashion, travel, music, telecommunications and energy, in several countries, remotely or in house, as a freelancer or as employee, in a team or leading as senior developer.
app.content.profilePromptSuffix: to find more details about myself.
app.sidebar.quote1: There are two ways of constructing a software design: One way is to make it so simple that there are obviously no deficiencies, and the other way is to make it so complicated that there are no obvious deficiencies. The first method is far more difficult.
app.sidebar.author1: —C.A.R. Hoare (British computer scientist, winner of the 1980 Turing Award)
app.sidebar.quote2: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.
app.sidebar.author2: —Edsger Dijkstra (Dutch computer scientist, winner of the 1972 Turing Award)
app.sidebar.quote3: Nine people can’t make a baby in a month.
app.sidebar.author3: —Fred Brooks (American computer scientist, winner of the 1999 Turing Award)
app.sidebar.quote4: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
app.sidebar.quote5: Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.
app.sidebar.author5: —Linus Torvalds (Finnish American, software engineer and hacker, principal force behind the development of the Linux kernel)

profile.title: Profile
profile.intro: I am an energetic and results-driven professional with more than 20 years of experience in software development across multiple industries. I thrive in dynamic, fast-paced environments and enjoy being part of teams that value responsibility, ownership, and continuous improvement. I am self-motivated, curious, and a quick learner, always enthusiastic about acquiring new skills and exploring better ways to achieve business objectives—while maintaining a good sense of humor.
profile.description1: Beyond my technical background, I am an expert in helping companies modernize their operations and successfully move toward 2026 and beyond. I specialize in guiding organizations through digital transformation initiatives that improve internal processes, optimize productivity, and enable smarter use of IT, AI, and emerging technologies. I help businesses adopt technology strategically—not just to innovate, but to produce more, work better, and create measurable value through intelligent automation, data-driven decision-making, and well-designed user experiences.
profile.description2: I am a problem solver with a strong "get things done" mindset, deeply focused on customer satisfaction and business impact. I bring a solid foundation in programming principles, Business Intelligence, and modern software architecture. Highly adaptable, I know when to lead with new ideas and when to step back and support the best ideas of others. I have strong analytical and troubleshooting skills and a proven ability to resolve complex technical challenges efficiently. As a primarily self-taught professional, I continuously learn new languages, frameworks, and methodologies, always applying SOLID principles, clean architecture, and proven design patterns.
profile.description3: I consider IT to be my vocation rather than simply my profession. My experience spans full-stack development, mobile applications, software architecture, cloud services, and the intelligent integration of AI and automation into real-world business workflows.
profile.description4: Throughout my career, I have gained extensive experience across diverse industries including airlines, music, education, energy, telecommunications, sports, fashion, hospitality, social networks, and travel. I have worked in on-site and remote roles, as a freelancer and contractor, within startups, small businesses, and large multinational consultancies. My roles have included software architect, team lead developer, and senior developer, often acting as a bridge between technical teams and business stakeholders. Thank you for your time and consideration. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my experience in software engineering, digital transformation, and intelligent use of technology could support and enhance your organization's processes and future goals. Please feel free to contact me at goodbytes23@gmail.com for any additional information. I have attached my resume below for further details on my experience.
profile.strongPoint1: 20+ years of experience in the IT industry.
profile.strongPoint2: Working with the full stack, front end, back end, databases and mobile applications.
profile.strongPoint3: Experience working alone, as a team member or leading a project.
profile.strongPoint4: Experience obtained by working in many different areas at various companies within several industries.
profile.strongPoint5: Self motivated, curious, self confident person and a quick hungry learner.
